channel.title: Squarespace help quote - centering element
channel.description:
[quote="hello@stephzangeneh.com"] Hello,
I got your information from the Squarespace Specialist list.
I'm having trouble with the Screenwriter cover page. I want the logo centered both horizontally and vertically with the button or navigation options below it. http://www.homesteaddesigncollective.com/
Can you give me a quote on how much this would cost?
Thanks, Steph [/quote]

item.title: Squarespace help quote - centering element
item.dc:creator: @cregox Caue Rego
item.description:
@cregox wrote:

Plase, read www.cregox.com/your-home

Your site asks for password to view.

But it should cost no more than U$213 if all you need is centering any element. It's usually just a matter of setting up a Custom CSS for it: https://css-tricks.com/centering-css-complete-guide/

Read full topic
